name: Circa50:Console
subtitle: Pet Scratcher
description:
The Modernist Cat Circa50: Console is perfect for any room in your home and ideal for small spaces! Designed by Crystal Gregory, this dual purpose console attaches to any wall for support and provides a sleek and functional solution for keeping important items at hand while giving your modern kitty the ultimate place to perch and scratch!

We offer custom fit FLOR carpet tiles that are easy to replace if it get’s worn or if you just want to change the color to switch-up your décor!
features: Hand crafted with Walnut Hardwood veneer Euro Ply
Removable/replaceable FLOR carpet tiles in 5 colors
Easy installation – wall mounting hardware included
specifications: Open Cubby: 19 ¾”W x 7 ½ D x 6”H
shipping: Items ship free, fully assembled (Continental US only)
For international shipping rates, please contact me for a quote
